experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Think Turbo is a Copilot for Data Analysis, that automates writing repetitive SQL queries. You may also create quick dashboards without writing SQL. Think of it as a 24/7 data assistant which not only helps data analysts but also anyone in the organisation who has a data question and has access to Think Turbo. We are now accepting pilot program requests. DM me if you want this super power in your company.

projects.title: Social Media
projects.description: A social network software purely built using Java. In the social network, there are a set of nodes. Each node can be of type: individual, group, business, or organisation. All nodes have a unique id (int), a set of links to other nodes, a name (String), a creation date, and a set of uploaded or posted content. A content can be implemented as a string object, which can be reposted multiple times without duplication. Individuals can optionally have birthdays in addition to all the node attributes. Businesses and organisations have location (2D coordinates) in addition to all node attributes. Groups and organisations can have linked individuals as members. Businesses can have individuals as owners or customers. Businesses can also be members of groups. No other forms of links are allowed, e.g. a business cannot be owner of another business, or a group cannot be a member of an organisation.
